argument.name: Status
argument.description: The status of a shipment sent through the United States Postal Service (USPS).

argument.name: confirmation_number
argument.description: The tracking number of a shipment sent through the United States Postal Service (USPS).

page.description: Contacts the USPS web site and looks up the status of the specified Delivery Confirmation number
page.discussion: The USPS_Delivery_Status() function contacts the USPS web site and looks up the status of a shipment sent through the United States Postal Service (USPS). It then returns the status of the shipment. Note : Use of this function requires an active Internet connection.
page.example: ? usps_delivery_status("01038454000555749770") = "Delivered" ? usps_delivery_status("12345678900000000") = "There is no record of this item." ? usps_delivery_status("123456789") = "Delivery status information is not available for your item via this web site."
